name: node-api
description: - it is a platform that uses the v8 engine of the Google Chrome, used to treat requests on a back-end server API Rest, like accessing data bases and etc; - it is strongly recommended to install NodeJS through package manager. In caso of you need to unistall or upgrade it in tests; - to test it, type:     ```js     node -v //it brings the node version     npm -v //it brings the npm version     ```
